tool.name: Exact-Tandems

param.name: minmatch
param.label: Minimum match length for the tandems

tool.help:
This script finds exact tandem repeats in a specified FastA sequence file.
**Output:** 4 columns: the start of the tandem repeat, the total extent of the repeat region, the length of each repetitive unit, and to total copies of the repetitive unit involved.
